r.s: Geographical locations based on Internet address
r.d: Obtains geographical information based on IP number, domain name, or AS number. Makes use of CAIDA Net_Geo lookup, HostIP or localizer extension.
r.n: QA release package 2.0 svn dir layout Bug #7229 package includes Extras/XML/Unserializer.php but doesn't give reference where t Bug #1294 Call-time pass-by-reference has been deprecated
